title: Wells Fargo Income Opportunities Fund (EAD) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Wells Fargo Income Opportunities Fund ( EAD  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.059 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased EAD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This represents an 13.53% increase over prior dividend payment. At the current stock price of $8.2, the dividend yield is 8.64%.
The previous trading day's last sale of EAD was $8.2, representing a -1.68% decrease from the 52 week high of $8.34 and a 18.67% increase over the 52 week low of $6.91.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the EAD Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
